tag_space.description: Tag space size that will be reserved for map usage.

extend_limits.description: Extend map limits to the maximum possible size.

resource_usage.description: Resource usage mode, can be 'none', 'check' or 'always'.

with_index.description: Include an index file in the build.

script_resource.description: Script resource mode, can be 'data or 'tags', tags is the default.

auto_forge.description: Ensure the map will be network compatible with the target engine's stock maps.

stock_resource_bounds.description: Only index tags if the tag's index is within stock Custom Edition's resource map bounds.
